name: Too many souls in this cavern
name_original: Too many souls in this cavern
description:
Made in approximately 3 days for Brackeys Game Jam 2022.2 "You're NOT alone."

Be a wizard, go on (supposedly) solitary treasure hunts and discover all the ways in which you might actually NOT be alone!

This is a very short hand-drawn action/adventure game with a blend of narration and combat (my first attempt at it actually). Hope you have a good laugh!

Controls:

  • Use ZQSD / WASD to move.
  • Left click to cast lightning spell, it then follows mouse movements with reduced speed.

Credits:

Programming, art and game design: Léa P.B.

Music and sound effect: freesound.org and incompetech.com
